title: Sales Representative Appointment Setter
job_overview:
We’re Hiring: Remote Full-Time Appointment Setter (Philippines-Based)

Ideal for women passionate about confidence, empowerment & deep connection

Work from home | 130–186 PHP/hour (based on experience) + 400 PHP commission per closed sale
Full-Time: 35–40 hours per week | 7–8 hour shifts | 5 shifts per week
Shifts available Monday–Sunday

    Monday to Friday: between 8:00am–7:30pm AEST
    Saturday & Sunday: between 9:00am–5:00pm AEST

With strong performance, you could earn an additional 4,000 PHP per week in commissions

We are Studio Republic, an empowerment-based photography studio in Australia. Our work helps women see themselves differently — with pride, power, and deep self-worth.

We’re hiring a Full-Time Appointment Setter to join our warm, high-performing remote team. If you're a woman who’s emotionally intelligent, confident in deep conversations, and committed to helping others feel empowered — this could be your next dream role.

You may only apply if you meet ALL of the following:

    Fluent, warm, and clear spoken English
    Able to build trust and emotional connection quickly
    Absolutely silent, distraction-free workspace
    Using noise-cancelling headset
    Reliable, high-speed internet
    Available during:
        Mon–Fri: 8:00am–7:30pm AEST
        Sat–Sun: 9:00am–5:00pm AEST
    Passionate about women’s confidence and storytelling
    Experienced or naturally gifted at navigating emotional objections without pressure

How to Apply:

Send a 2-minute audio message answering:

    Why do you want to work with Studio Republic?
    What does “empowerment” mean to you?
    Share a time in your life when your self-esteem was low — and how you rebuilt it.
    What makes someone feel truly heard and seen?
    What would you say to someone who’s nervous about being photographed?

Objection Scenario:

"I really want to do it… but it just feels like a lot of money to spend on myself. I never do things like this. I just don’t know if I can justify it."

How would you support her in that Upgrade to see actual infont — without pressure, and with heart?

Send To: Upgrade to see actual info
Subject line: Full-Time Appointment Setter Application – [Your Name]

Include:

    Your audio message
    Short CV or background
    Photo of your workspace
    Confirmation of internet speed, noise-cancelling headset, and quiet working conditions
